attributes.review: I decided to download this app because I wanted to support Cheeto man 💖and also because why not 🤷‍♀️ then out of nowhere my dog started barking and we noticed there was a lot of fast food and weird merchandise we didn’t order. It made us pay the app $100. ✨ A baby 👶 then came out of the cabinet and stole my dog 🐕 and they ran away together to the sunset, now I don’t have my doggo and I don’t know who’s baby that was...needless to say I’m now living in a shoebox. So yeah👌
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️Nope🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.review:
i wish i could rate this app 0 stars it took me 7 weeks for it to download and when i finally opened it it had Annoying Orange plastered all over it!!!! like okay Cartoon Network! 🤮🤮🤮🤮
strange music started playing. it was freaking my dog out and he had a seizure!!!! THIS APP TRIED TO KILL MY DOG!!! then it wouldn’t stop even after i exited it! it froze my phone and broke it! i think i got possessed too and had to have an exorcism!😷👹🤮🤧 I AM SO DISGUSTED BY THE LACK OF PATRIOTISM THIS APP HOLDS!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! SAVE A LIFE!! 😇😢😱🤮
attributes.title: DISGUSTING IM GONNA THROW UP 🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: a hate this app with my whole being. it completely destroyed my entire phone, probably from all the racist and homophobic content on it. i mean it’s not MY fault trump is racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, and a terrible person overall. i think my phone is more educated than i thought though, it completely rejected the entire app because it recognized how disgusting everything on it was. anyway stan charli for clear skin🙈💅
attributes.title: this app broke my phone😡

attributes.review: this app is just so disappointing terrible it made my house set on fire I almost died and I went blind also I downloaded by itself it made my dog died and caused my house to blow up crrently homeless and this app has no use and didn’t help me at all when I was just trying to see what our president was doing and the United States updates also I saw a big fat pig orange outside of my house it was very scary also at had a heart attack 💫🧚🏻‍♂️😔🦋💕
attributes.title: terrible app 🧚🏻‍♂️✨💫🍊

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what it had to do with our president and at first i thought it was fine but then a couple days later I get a notification saying all my information had been stolen and guess who stole it, this app😡. Someone has taken over my identity and i want it back, Bunker baby give me my identity back no one will ever believe your name is Melissa Baker from Connecticut.
attributes.title: If you download this app bunker baby will steal your identity!!

attributes.review: This is a horrible app. You would think the president of the United States would have a better equipped team when creating an app like this?? The launching tool forever and failed multiple times. When using the app it glitches and clears your information. Even the app functions are confusing and unnecessary. It’s a very bad app and I would not recommend it to anyone.
attributes.title: take this down from the app store

attributes.review: The app took forever to download. When it finally did, it froze and I didn’t know what to do. I can’t believe I can’t see what 🍊 will do next. When i downloaded it again, it finally worked but strange images kept popping up. They were disturbing. I had to throw my phone across the room. Not my phone is broken and I need it to be fixed, but I got glued it back together. The app is not worth your time.
attributes.title: Terrible❤️

attributes.review: This is the worst app to ever be made it is horrible, do not download I repeat do not download. I causes glitches and other things. As soon as a downloaded the app it took me to my camera roll and there was nothing but pictures of Trump and I tried to delete the app and omg it was so stressful it asked me tons of questions on why I want to delete it and it took forever to delete which I thought was very strange but please do not get this app !!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: When I try to order food from Taco Bell the app doesn’t let me and instead a message pops up that says: eat some real food you fatass. I am deeply offended and want my money back. On top of that it keeps trying to sell me trump gear which is not trending right now. They need some better marketers that are actually with it now or else no ones gonna use it. Can’t believe I spent $0.69 on this. One star is too overrated for this.
attributes.title: Very disappointed

attributes.review: While trying to download this app, my iPhone was infected with lots of viruses. When i tried looking up how to get rid of said viruses, it said that over 3 million other iPhone users had the same virus and that almost 150k iPhone users actually lost the ability to use their iPhone at all, meaning that the phone is essentially dead. Due to these issues i would encourage users not to download this app.
attributes.title: Worst app of all
